Chapter 1

Eyes closed , [Rachel Foster]81-rachel drew in a steeling breath , shut out the din of voices at the surrounding tables in [the bar]274-the bar , and said aloud for the first time ever , “ [Mom]82-mom , [Dad]2233-dad , [I]81-rachel resigned from [my]81-rachel position at [the design firm]2234-the design firm after [Shaun]83-shaun took credit for [my]81-rachel work . [I]81-rachel moved out of [[our]2235-our shared apartment]2236-our shared apartment and took a job as [a bartender]2237-a bartender instead . ”[81-rachel] Other than background chatter , silence greeted [her]81-rachel . [She]81-rachel held [her]81-rachel breath for a few seconds before opening [her]81-rachel eyes . [The fifty - something guy across from [her]81-rachel]275-the fifty - something guy across from her blinked , fries gone cold on [his]275-the fifty - something guy across from her plate . “ Should [I]81-rachel have started with [[my]81-rachel ex]2238-my ex taking credit for [my]81-rachel work , then moved to the resignation ? Or is it best to open with [the bartender]2239-the bartender bit ? ”[81-rachel] [she]81-rachel asked [him]275-the fifty - something guy across from her . “ [I]81-rachel think [they]2240-they ’ll love [you]275-the fifty - something guy across from her no matter what . ”[81-rachel] [The man on the guest side of the bar]276-the man on the guest side of the bar , who ’d agreed to play the role of “ [Mom]82-mom and [Dad]84-dad , ”[85-oliver] smiled . [Oliver]85-oliver Something . [He]85-oliver had kind green eyes , a plain face , and thick hair dyed a shade too dark for [his]85-oliver age and skin tone . [He]85-oliver was [a regular at [the bar where [she]81-rachel worked]278-the bar where she worked , enjoying the same exact meal ( turkey club , no mayo ) each and every week]277-a regular at the bar where she worked , enjoying the same exact meal ( turkey club , no mayo ) each and every week . [He]85-oliver always ate , but never drank alcohol , only soda . And [he]85-oliver had [a big , beautiful Great Dane , a dog [she]81-rachel would soon be in charge of while living in [[his]85-oliver gorgeous apartment]280-his gorgeous apartment]279-a big , beautiful great dane , a dog she would soon be in charge of while living in his gorgeous apartment . [She]81-rachel really needed to learn [Oliver]85-oliver ’s last name . “ [You]85-oliver say that because [you]85-oliver ’ve never met [them]2241-them . ”[81-rachel] [She]81-rachel grabbed the soda gun from behind the bar and refilled [his]85-oliver Diet Coke . “ Maybe [I]81-rachel should n’t tell [them]2241-them at all . ”[81-rachel] “ [Rachel]81-rachel . ”[85-oliver] [He]85-oliver brushed [his]85-oliver hands on a paper napkin . “ [I]85-oliver ’m old enough to be [[your]81-rachel father]2242-your father . ”[85-oliver] “ [Uncle]2243-uncle , ”[81-rachel] [she]81-rachel corrected , being generous . “ [Older uncle]2244-older uncle . Either way , [I]81-rachel have longer perspective than [you]85-oliver do given that [I]81-rachel ’m closer to the grave , and [I]81-rachel ’m advising [you]85-oliver to tell [[your]85-oliver folks]2245-your folks what ’s going on . ”[81-rachel] [He]85-oliver was right , of course . [She]81-rachel had n’t told [them]281-them anything , and the least [they]281-them deserved was the truth . After [her]81-rachel and [Shaun]83-shaun ’s relationship had imploded , [she]81-rachel ’d grieved alone and put on a happy voice for [[her]81-rachel mother]282-her mother ’s phone calls . Inside , [she]81-rachel ’d been aching . Two years was a long time to be with [someone]283-someone . [She]81-rachel had begun to accept [his]85-oliver faults — like the fact [he]85-oliver was grouchy in the evenings and could be abrasive and critical — but when [he]85-oliver ’d betrayed [her]81-rachel and took the promotion [she]81-rachel ’d earned , [she]81-rachel pushed the eject button without a second thought . “ [I]81-rachel ’ll tell [them]284-her family . ”[81-rachel] Eventually . [She]81-rachel was n’t ready to call [[her]81-rachel family]284-her family in [Ohio]1-ohio and drop on [their]284-her family lap that [[their]284-her family successful , city - dwelling daughter]285-their successful , city - dwelling daughter was not watching the gold nameplate go up on [[her]81-rachel corner office]286-her corner office door . Instead , [she]81-rachel was stacking dirty dishes in a bus tub and cleaning sticky , disgusting residue out of the rubber mat over which [she]81-rachel poured libations for eight hours a night , five to six days a week . * * *

[[Tag]80-tag ’s oldest brother]318-tag ’s oldest brother and [CEO for [Crane Hotels]7-crane hotels]319-ceo for crane hotels , [Reese Crane]91-reese , had no love for [the board of directors around the conference table]320-the board of directors around the conference table . The door shut behind [them]324-them and [he]91-reese faced [[his]91-reese brother]325-his brother . “ The term ‘ acceptable losses ’ is n’t bad news . ”[91-reese] [Reese]91-reese arched an eyebrow . “ Loss should never be ‘ acceptable , ’ ”[80-tag] [Tag]80-tag growled . “ [The board]2250-the board harps on falling profits in [the hotel bars]2251-the hotel bars last year , but as of thirty seconds ago [they]2250-the board no longer care ? ”[80-tag] [Tag]80-tag dropped [his]80-tag unused number 2 pencil to push a hand through [his]80-tag hair , then remembered it was pulled back . [They]328-they ’re not worried . Take that as a compliment . ”[80-tag] [Reese]91-reese shrugged easily , taking it in stride . A far cry from where [he]91-reese was a year ago , when [he]91-reese nearly went apoplectic on [Frank]92-frank . [The board]2250-the board had tried to keep [Reese]91-reese from becoming [CEO]334-ceo , citing disapproval over [Reese]91-reese ’s playboy lifestyle . The good news was [Reese]91-reese had ended up with [a wife]335-a wife — now [ex - wife]336-ex - wife , soon to be [[his]91-reese wife]337-his wife again ( long story)—but at the moment , [Tag]80-tag was having a hard time finding [his]80-tag own silver lining . [He]80-tag did n’t consider futility a compliment . [He]80-tag lifted the report in front of [him]80-tag — the one [he]80-tag ’d received months ago . Filled with spreadsheets , numbers , and projected targets , it was seriously structured . And seriously pissing [him]80-tag off . “ Why the fuck did [they]2252-they give [me]80-tag this if [they]2252-they were n’t going to follow through ? ”[80-tag] The cover read “ Fiscal Projections for Food and Alcohol . ”[80-tag] The word fiscal was enough to give [him]80-tag hives , but [he]80-tag ’d pored over those sheets , those numbers , until [his]80-tag eyes felt like they were going to bleed . Chapter 2

A sharp bark startled [Tag]80-tag , and [his]80-tag arm jerked , dragging the tip of the Sharpie across the Post - it and onto the photograph [he]80-tag had been trying not to ruin . For most of the evening [he]80-tag ’d mentally blocked out the barks that had punctuated the air approximately every ten seconds before narrowing to every two or three seconds . Now they were almost constant . Woof ! Woof ! Woo - oof ! [He]80-tag could not freaking work in these conditions . Judging by the direction of the sound , and the deep , barrel - chested baritone , [he]80-tag guessed the barker none other than [Adonis]86-adonis , [Oliver Chambers]85-oliver ’s giant white - with - black - splotches Great Dane . [Tag]80-tag had been patient — [Adonis]86-adonis was a dog , and dogs barked — but the dog had never barked this much , and never this late at night . [He]80-tag ’d been determined to ignore it , but [he]80-tag needed every ounce of concentration [he]80-tag could muster . [He]80-tag was reviewing the setup for the main candidate for a recent bar redesign : [the pool bar at [the Crane Makai]401-the crane makai in [Hawaii]9-hawaii]400-the pool bar at the crane makai in hawaii . [He]99-eli let out a dry chuff . Sounded like heaven .

[He]99-eli cared about different things now . [He]99-eli wanted different things now . [He]99-eli glanced around the table at [[his]99-eli family]353-his family . [Reese]91-reese dished out some of [his]91-reese Mongolian beef onto [Merina]97-merina ’s plate while [she]97-merina stole a sip of [his]91-reese wine . [Rachel]81-rachel slid off [Tag]80-tag ’s lap with a smile and [Tag]80-tag lifted [her]81-rachel hand to kiss it . [Rhona]118-rhona unwrapped a pair of chopsticks and handed them to [Alex]98-alex . [Eli]99-eli did n’t want what [they]353-his family had . None of it . [His]99-eli reasoning was simple . [He]99-eli refused to want something [he]99-eli could n’t have . [Life]252-life had spoken . [He]99-eli was listening . [He]99-eli did n’t need another relationship to be whole . [He]99-eli did n’t need [anyone]991-anyone .
